title: Frida Kahlo/Frida Kahlo
description: The book is pure fiction, sometimes touching lightly on fantasy but always returning to earth with a ripe pungency. --
This episodic novel conjure[s] Kahlo as a mutable entity living through three artists as they navigate life, love and art. --

Derivitive of Michael Cunningham's acclaimed re-envisioning of the famous persona of Mrs. Dalloway in The Hours, FRIDA KAHLO/FRIDA KAHLO is still charming readers with its three generations of Frida Kahlos.
